name: ironcalc
tagline: A self-hosted spreadsheet platform for collaborative data work
description: IronCalc is a self hosted spreadsheet engine and collaboration platform that aims to provide an alternative to proprietary online spreadsheets. It enables sharing, formulas and structured data while keeping documents on your own server.

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Multiple users can work on the same spreadsheet simultaneously

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Keep all spreadsheet data on your own server for privacy

features.title: Data Export
features.description: Open and save files in Excel and other common formats

features.title: REST API
features.description: Programmatically interact with spreadsheets via REST API
